title: London, BL, Add. 14509
collection of Choral Services for the festivals of the whole year, comprising many hymns (ܩ̈ܠܐ, ܥܢܝ̈ܢܐ , ܡܕܪ̈ܫܐ , ܣܘ̈ܓܝܬܐ , ܒ̈ܬܐ ܕܒܣ̈ܡܐ , etc.) and prayers, ascribed to Ephraim and Jacob of Batnae
Dedication of the Church
Annunciation of the Virgin
Visit of Mary to Elisabeth
Nativity of S. John the Baptist
Revelation of S. Joseph
Nativity of our Lord
Commemoration of the blessed Virgin
Massacre of the Innocents
Epiphany
Commemoration of S. John the Baptist
Presentation in the Temple
Forty Martyrs
Commemoration of any Saint
Commemoration of the Teachers
Commemoration of Severus of Antioch
Part of a madrāshā on the Resurrection of the Dead
author: Ephrem
